predicate.note: Frames file for 'strive' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'try'.

roleset.name: try, attempt

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Sotheby's, the auction house founded in London 1744 and now under the umbrella of Sotheby's Holdings Inc., was hoping to stir up interest in old masters as it strove to build its U.S. business.

roleset.note: Frankly, I'm impressed the wordnet lemmatizer recognized "strove" as the past tense of "strive".
